original_text: And the children of Israel saw the face of Moses, that the skin of Moses' face shone: and Moses put the vail upon his face again, until he went in to speak with him.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 모세의 얼굴의 광채를 보므로 모세가 여호와께 말하러 들어가기까지 다시 수건으로 자기 얼굴을 가렸더라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel saw the face of Moses
that the skin of Moses' face shone
and Moses put the vail upon his face again
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 다시 자기 얼굴에 수건을 씌웠으며

sentences.original_text: until he went in to speak with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그분과 말씀하기 위해 들어갈 때까지 그러했다
